Change: ‘addColumn’

Adds a new column to an existing table

Available attributes

Name Description Required For Supports Since
catalogName Name of the catalog all 3.0
schemaName Name of the schema all
tableName Name of the table to add the column to all all

Nested properties

Name Description Required For Supports Multiple Allowed
columns Column constraint and foreign key information. Setting the "defaultValue" attribute will specify a default value for the column. Setting the "value" attribute will set all rows existing to the specified value without modifying the column default.

See the column tag documentation for more information		 all all yes
